results.title: Something for everyone
results.brief_description: Looks at the problem of youth unemployment and how it affects job seekers. Uses a humorous approach to present the case of a young man who loses his job and the problems he faces when he tries to find another. Cast includes: David Bradley, Lachlin Miles, Dave Taggart, Pina Marino, Rossi Webb, Ingrid Buxton. Music: Milton Trot and Bill Menz.

results.title: Solar prominences
results.creator_credit: Audio Visual Education Center, University of Michigan and McMath-Hulbert Observatory
results.brief_description: Presents observations, during the period of 140 hours, at a specially designed solar telescope recording the activities of gaseous clouds near the sun’s surface. The types of prominences included are quiescent, spot, cap, quasi-eruptive, and loop or fountain.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Audio Visual Education Center, University of Michigan and McMath-Hulbert Observatory

results.title: Soil: more than dirt
results.brief_description: This program lokks at land degredation due to salting, soil erosion and soil structure decline because of over use of the land itself, this in turn leads to low agricultural productivity. The research done by the department of Conservation, Forests and Land suggests ways and means of better land management practices. No other credits

results.title: Soil structure decline
results.creator_credit: Gerry North and Western Australia. Dept. of Agriculture
results.brief_description: After a short period of cultivationn, our soils are losing their inherent structure and are becoming difficult to work. This program discusses soil structure decline and its effect on agricultural productivity.

results.title: Soil Conservation District: Jerramungup
results.creator_credit: Gerry North and Western Australia. Dept. of Agriculture
results.brief_description: Describes how each committee member deals with a land degredation problem. Problems discussed and projects undertaken: wind erosion, tree and saltbush planting, direct drilling research, reduction of salinity and waterlogging in catchment area, growing of lucerne to reduce saline watertable.

results.title: Social encounter
results.brief_description: Seven separate one-minute “telespots” depicting various types of social relationships: Loveliness of a woman; Walk like a man; Masks of man; The smile; Driver and pedestrian; I hate elevators; Restricted neighbourhood. The “spots” are designed to facilitate discussion on the impact of personal values on various every-day situations. Thought provoking.

results.title: So you won't get aids (Captioned)
results.brief_description: This teaching aid, aimed at Intellectually Disabled people, instructs about AIDS and sexually transmitted diseases, focusing on prevention. Some scenes are sexually explicit. This title should be used in conjunction with a teaching environment. Includes supertext.
